name: Nightmare Beyond Dawn (chillyapples) (chillyapples)
description:
Nightmare Beyond Dawn is a short action horror game.  Someone hears a strange noise in the woods and chooses to investigate it.

Bloom Effect used:  https://github.com/keijiro/KinoBloom

Image Effect used:  https://github.com/keijiro/KinoTube
